urls.title: Reduce the Environmental Impact of Oil
urls.description: The Oil Care Campaign is a joint initiative to provide advice - helping you look after, recycle and reduce the environmental risk of oil

tweets.text:
Any oil leak, no matter how small, can be devastating for aquatic wildlife, birds and fish.

After the recent cold weather now is a good time to check your domestic oil tank for weakened joints and damaged underground pipes.

For more information: https://t.co/UF6jGHz65H https://t.co/Z9RY2UySjj
